publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3913 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Non-Domestic Rating (Petrol Filling Stations, Public Houses and Hotels) (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of the draft Non-Domestic Rating (Petrol Filling Stations, Public Houses and Hotels) (Scotland) Order 2003, recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-3913 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Non-Domestic Rating (Petrol Filling Stations, Public Houses and Hotels) (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of the draft Non-Domestic Rating (Petrol Filling Stations, Public Houses and Hotels) (Scotland) Order 2003, recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
